channel.title: CVE Feed for MPL-Publisher -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MPL-Publisher -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39343|2024-08-04T02:06:42.441Z -- mpl-publisher -- mpl-publisher
item.description: The MPL-Publisher WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient input validation and sanitization via several parameters found in the ~/libs/PublisherController.php file which allowed attackers with administrative user access to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.30.2. This affects multi-site installations where unfiltered_html is disabled for administrators, and sites where unfiltered_html is disabled.
